translation.en: like, in really one minute.

translation.zh: ‘操布琳·布朗 操布琳·布朗’”

translation.en: [Brené] And I was like...
translation.zh: 然后我就…

translation.en: I was like,
translation.zh: 我就想：

translation.en: "This is the worst mm-ing story ever!"
translation.zh: “这是史上最他妈的糟故事”

translation.en: And he said, "Then I got home,
translation.zh: 接着他说：“然后我回到家

translation.en: and I just, you know, barged into my apartment.
translation.zh: 我闯进我的公寓

translation.en: Both my roommates were sitting on the couch,
translation.zh: 我的两位室友正坐在沙发上

translation.en: and they were on their laptops,
translation.zh: 在玩着手提电脑

translation.en: and they were like, 'Dude, what's wrong?'" And he's like,
translation.zh: 他们俩说：‘兄弟 怎么了？’而他说：

translation.en: "I told her I loved her...
translation.zh: “我告诉她我爱她

translation.en: and she broke up with me."
translation.zh: 然后她和我分手了”

translation.en: And his roommate goes, "That was so lame.
translation.zh: 然后他的室友说：“那好笨

translation.en: You can't go after them.
translation.zh: 你不能追着她们

translation.en: When you head toward them, they move away.
translation.zh: 当你朝着她们去 她们会走开

translation.en: When you're always moving away, they move toward them.
translation.zh: 当你总是走开 她们会朝着你来

translation.en: This is the way it works."
translation.zh: 是这样运作的”

translation.en: And he was like, "I told them. I was like, 'Oh, what? No!
translation.zh: 然后他说：“我告诉他们‘噢 什么？不！

translation.en: Man, that's not who I want to be. I was daring greatly.'"
translation.zh: 兄弟 那不是我想成为的人我在拥抱脆弱的力量’”

translation.en: And he said both of them just got really misty-eyed and went,
translation.zh: 他说他们俩就开始泪眼朦胧然后说：

translation.en: -"Right on, man! Right on!" -[audience cheers]
translation.zh: “好样的 兄弟！好样的！”

translation.en: So number one,
translation.zh: 所以第一

translation.en: if you're gonna be in the arena, join me. It's really great.
translation.zh: 如果你将置身于竞技场 请加入我那是真的很棒

translation.en: When you're down on the ground, blood, sweat, tear--
translation.zh: 当你倒在地上满是鲜血、汗水、泪水

translation.en: You know, it's an interesting view.
translation.zh: 那是个很有趣的景色

translation.en: You can see other people who are brave too.
translation.zh: 你可以看见其他也勇敢的人

translation.en: Um, two, vulnerability is not weakness. In fact, it's--
translation.zh: 第二 脆弱感不是个弱点 事实上 它是…

translation.en: You know, vulnerability is our most accurate way
translation.zh: 脆弱感是我们衡量勇气最准确的方法

translation.en: to measure courage, and we literally do that as researchers.
translation.zh: 脆弱感是我们衡量勇气最准确的方法 而我们研究者们真的就是这么做

translation.en: We can measure how brave you are by how vulnerable you're willing to be.
translation.zh: 我们能通过你愿意变得多脆弱来衡量你有多勇敢

translation.en: The last thing I learned that day
translation.zh: 我在与西奥多·罗斯福的上帝时刻

translation.en: in my God moment with Theodore Roosevelt
translation.zh: 明白到的最后一件事情

translation.en: was this:
translation.zh: 是这个：

translation.en: If you are not in the arena
translation.zh: 如果你不在竞技场内

translation.en: getting your ass kicked on occasion because you were being brave,
translation.zh: 因为勇敢而偶尔被打得落花流水

translation.en: I am not interested in or open to your feedback about my work.
translation.zh: 那我不感兴趣 也不接受你对我的工作提出意见

translation.en: Period.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: -[audience applauds] -[Brené] Just period.
translation.zh: 句号

translation.en: And there's a really, really, I think, easy...
translation.zh: 这能用一个非常非常 简单的方式去想

translation.en: way to think about it, and it's this:
translation.zh: 简单的方式去想 是这个：今天世上有数以百万计的廉价座位

translation.en: There are millions of cheap seats in the world today
translation.zh: 是这个：今天世上有数以百万计的廉价座位

translation.en: filled with people who will never once step foot in that arena.
translation.zh: 坐满了永远都不会踏入竞技场的人

translation.en: They will never once put themselves out there,
translation.zh: 他们永远都不会勇敢踏出去

translation.en: but they will make it a full-time job
translation.zh: 但他们会把批评我们 评判我们

translation.en: to hurl criticism and judgment and really hateful things toward us.
translation.zh: 以及对我们说真正可恨的东西作为他们的全职工作

translation.en: And we have got to get out of the habit of catching them
translation.zh: 而我们必须摆脱一个习惯也就是接住它们 解剖它们

translation.en: and dissecting and, you know, holding them close to our hearts.
translation.zh: 然后把它们牢牢挂在心上

translation.en: We've gotta let them drop on the floor.
translation.zh: 我们得放手 让它们通通掉在地上

translation.en: Don't grab that hurtful stuff from the cheap seats and pull it close.
translation.zh: 别抓住那从廉价座位抛下来的伤人的东西 并将它拉近 别让它靠近你的心

translation.en: Don't pull it anywhere near your heart.
translation.zh: 并将它拉近 别让它靠近你的心

translation.en: Just let it fall to the ground. You don't have to stomp it or kick it.
translation.zh: 就让它掉在地上 你不必踩踏它或踢它

translation.en: You just gotta step over it and keep going.
translation.zh: 你只需要跨过它 继续前进

translation.en: You can't take criticism and feedback
translation.zh: 你不能接受那些不勇敢活着的人

translation.en: from people who are not being brave with their lives.
translation.zh: 给你的批评和意见

translation.en: It just will crush you.
translation.zh: 那只会毁了你

translation.en: You know, I've been teaching graduate school for 22 years,
translation.zh: 你知道吗 我教了二十二年的研究院

translation.en: and here's what's interesting.
translation.zh: 发现了这件有趣的事

translation.en: To kind of deal with this huge,
translation.zh: 为了应付这无所不在的

translation.en: crushing mountain of negativity and vitriol everywhere,
translation.zh: 极具摧毁性的消极和尖刻

translation.en: especially social media,
translation.zh: 尤其是在社交媒体上

translation.en: there's this kind of wholesale adoption of "I don't give a shit
translation.zh: 大规模的人都会采用： “我不在乎一屎别人怎么想”

translation.en: what anyone thinks."
translation.zh: “我不在乎一屎别人怎么想”

translation.en: How many of you have heard this? How many of you have said it?
translation.zh: 你们多少人听过这句话？ 你们多少人说过这句话？

translation.en: -[audience murmurs] -Right. Yes, you do.
translation.zh: 对 是 你是

translation.en: -[audience chuckles] -You totally care.
translation.zh: 你是在乎的

translation.en: Like, you're neurobiologically hardwired to care what people think.
translation.zh: 你大脑的天生设计就是要你在乎别人怎么想

translation.en: You have not hacked that.
translation.zh: 那不是你造出来的

translation.en: We care what people think.
translation.zh: 我们在乎别人怎么想

translation.en: The deal is that you have to be very specific
translation.zh: 但事情是这样的 你必须非常具体

translation.en: about people whose opinions of you matter.
translation.zh: 哪些人对你的意见是重要的

translation.en: It's not that you don't give a shit what anyone thinks.
translation.zh: 并不是要你不在乎任何人怎么想

translation.en: Just don't give a shit what some people think.
translation.zh: 而是要你不在乎一些人怎么想

translation.en: -[audience chuckles] -And then really solicit feedback
translation.zh: 然后向那些给你好意见的人

translation.en: from the people that do... give you good feedback.
translation.zh: 好好地征求意见

translation.en: And you know who makes that list?
translation.zh: 你知道哪些人在那清单上吗？

translation.en: I'll tell you who should make the list.
translation.zh: 我告诉你哪些人该在那清单上

translation.en: People who love you, not despite your imperfection and vulnerability,
translation.zh: 爱你的人不是尽管你的不完美和脆弱

translation.en: but because of your imperfection and vulnerability. Their feedback matters.
translation.zh: 而是因为你的不完美和脆弱这些人的意见很重要

translation.en: Not the "yes" people, but the people who say, "Yeah,
translation.zh: 不是那些唯唯诺诺的人而是会这么说的人：“对

translation.en: that kind of sucked,
translation.zh: 那糟透了 你真的是太过分了

translation.en: and you were really out of line, and you need to clean that shit up,
translation.zh: 那糟透了 你真的是太过分了 你得清理那团糟我会在这里为你加油

translation.en: and I'll be here cheering you on, but that was not okay."
translation.zh: 你得清理那团糟我会在这里为你加油 但你那样做是不对的”

translation.en: So, for me, this moment,
translation.zh: 所以对我而言 这一刻

translation.en: this daring greatly moment with Theodore Roosevelt
translation.zh: 与西奥多·罗斯福的这脆弱的力量一刻

translation.en: changed everything, and it really helped me understand
translation.zh: 改变了一切 并真的帮助我理解

translation.en: what vulnerability is and what it means to be in the arena--
translation.zh: 脆弱感是什么 以及置身于竞技场

translation.en: to show up and be brave.
translation.zh: 站出来和勇敢都意味着什么

translation.en: I want to tell a story
translation.zh: 我想讲一个

translation.en: that gives some color and context to what it means to be vulnerable.
translation.zh: 能为“拥抱脆弱”提供一些颜色和背景的故事

translation.en: So this is Lake Travis in Austin.
translation.zh: 这是奥斯汀的特拉维斯湖

translation.en: -[audience whoops] -Any Longhorns in the audience? Hook 'em!
translation.zh: 观众里有没有长角牛迷？牛角手势！

translation.en: I knew I liked you right from the beginning.
translation.zh: 我从一开始就知道我喜欢你

translation.en: -Yes. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: So this is my magic lake. This--
translation.zh: 这是我的神奇湖

translation.en: I spent every summer of my childhood on this lake in Austin.
translation.zh: 我童年的每个夏天都在奥斯汀的这个湖上度过

translation.en: Um, it's where I learned how to, like,
translation.zh: 我在这里学会如何做

translation.en: do all the things that, you know, Texas girls learn how to do.
translation.zh: 所有德州女孩学会做的东西

translation.en: Fish, run a trotline for catfish,
translation.zh: 钓鱼、下拦河钩绳钓鲶鱼

translation.en: um... shoot BB guns, swim.
translation.zh: 射BB枪、游泳

translation.en: I mean, this was my life.
translation.zh: 这是我的人生

translation.en: So a couple of years ago, Steve and I decide
translation.zh: 所以几年前 史蒂夫和我决定

translation.en: that we're gonna pool our vacation for the year
translation.zh: 我们会把那年的假全部凑在一起

translation.en: and take one long vacation,
translation.zh: 然后度一个长假

translation.en: rent a house on Lake Travis, and go.
translation.zh: 在特拉维斯湖上租个房子 然后出发

translation.en: And I am so excited. So, like, two and a half weeks.
translation.zh: 我非常兴奋 那长达两个半星期

translation.en: So we rent this big house, we reach out to our families and say,
translation.zh: 我们租了这大房子我们联系我们的家人

translation.en: "We've rented this house. This is where we're gonna be.
translation.zh: 告诉他们：“我们租了这房子我们会在这里

translation.en: If you want to come visit us, do it,
translation.zh: 如果想来拜访我们就来吧

translation.en: but schedule it on your own."
translation.zh: 但自己安排”

translation.en: 'Cause my parents are divorced and remarried, his parents are divorced and remarried.
translation.zh: 我的父母 他的父母都已离婚并各自再婚

translation.en: It's like NASA-level coordinating on stuff like this.
translation.zh: 协调这种东西就像是NASA等级的事

translation.en: So just, "We're gonna be here."
translation.zh: 所以就只是：“我们会在这”

translation.en: So it's great. So we're packing, and we always have these--
translation.zh: 我们在收拾行李然后我们一直都有这些…

translation.en: Do y'all have these, or are we the only people?
translation.zh: 这你们也有或是我们而已？

translation.en: Like, we call them the CTJs.
translation.zh: 我们称它们为耶稣谈 度假耶稣谈

translation.en: The vacation CTJ, the vacation come-to-Jesus talk,
translation.zh: 我们称它们为耶稣谈 度假耶稣谈 在我们出发之前的度假“走近耶稣”谈话

translation.en: before we leave.
translation.zh: 在我们出发之前的度假“走近耶稣”谈话

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Do y'all have these in your lives?
translation.zh: 你们生活中有这些吗？

translation.en: Where you have to level set expectation. Like, I'll give you an example.
translation.zh: 就是用来确保你们的期望一致 我给你举个例子这不是这个 但这是较近期的

translation.en: This is not this, but this is more recent.
translation.zh: 我给你举个例子这不是这个 但这是较近期的

translation.en: We were going to Disney, and I was packing, and he said,
translation.zh: 我们要去迪斯尼 我在收拾行李然后他说：

translation.en: "I think we need to have our, like, CTJ on Disney."
translation.zh: “我觉得我们得来个迪斯尼的耶稣谈”

translation.en: And I was like, "Why?" And he said,
translation.zh: 而我说：“为啥？” 他说：

translation.en: "You've got five books, man. What are you doing with these?"
translation.zh: “你这里有五本书 伙计你这是要干嘛？”

translation.en: And he-- I'm like, "I'm taking them to vacation.
translation.zh: 我说：“我要带它们去度假

translation.en: Do you know how long it's been since I've read good fiction?"
translation.zh: 你知道我已经多久没读到本好小说了吗？

translation.en: He goes, "You ain't reading nothing for the next four days
translation.zh: 他说：“接下来的四天你啥都别想读除了

translation.en: but 'too tall to ride,' 'too short to ride.'"
translation.zh: 他说：“接下来的四天你啥都别想读除了 ‘太高 不能玩’ ‘太矮 不能玩’”

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -I was like, "What?"
translation.zh: 我说：“什么？”

translation.en: And he was like, "You won't be in the hotel reading.
translation.zh: 而他说：“你没得待在酒店看书

translation.en: We're taking, like, five kids to Disney."
translation.zh: 我们正带着五个小孩去迪斯尼”

translation.en: So this was our CTJ for Lake Travis.
translation.zh: 所以这是我们的特拉维斯湖耶稣谈

translation.en: We're like, "Two and a half weeks. How do you do a vacation that long?"
translation.zh: 我们想：“两个半星期这么长的假要怎么度？”

translation.en: We'd never been on a long vacation. He's like, "First of all,
translation.zh: 我们不曾度过长假 他说：“首先 一定要给孩子们制定规则”

translation.en: there's gotta be rules for the kids."
translation.zh: 他说：“首先 一定要给孩子们制定规则”

translation.en: If we just, like, go crazy on normal vacation,
translation.zh: 如果我们像正常度假般放肆

translation.en: and let them do screen time and stay up late,
translation.zh: 给他们无限屏幕时间 让他们熬夜

translation.en: they'll be feral by the time we get back.
translation.zh: 回到家时他们会很狂野

translation.en: So we gotta have, like, limited screen time, early bedtime.
translation.zh: 所以我们得限制屏幕时间 让他们早睡”

translation.en: And then I started to get the bug, and I'm like,
translation.zh: 然后我开始热衷了起来 我说：

translation.en: "We're gonna do a healthy vacation.
translation.zh: “我们会度个健康的假

translation.en: We're gonna do, like, a healthy family vacation.
translation.zh: 我们会来个健康的家庭度假

translation.en: And we're gonna cook, and we're not gonna eat a lot of crap,
translation.zh: 我们会自己下厨不吃一大堆垃圾食物

translation.en: and we're gonna work out every day.
translation.zh: 我们会每天运动”

translation.en: And he's like, "I love it."
translation.zh: 而他说：“这我喜欢”

translation.en: So we decide to swim every day. We're gonna swim this cove every day. And so,
translation.zh: 所以我们决定每天游泳每天都在这个小湾游泳

translation.en: we met coaching swimming. We're both ex-competitive swimmers.
translation.zh: 我们是当游泳教练时认识的我们俩都是前游泳选手

translation.en: He still swims competitively.
translation.zh: 他依然游得像个选手

translation.en: I'm a shame researcher.
translation.zh: 我是个羞耻心研究者

translation.en: And so, I was like, "But I can do it." Like, I can do this. Right? So...
translation.zh: 可是我想：“我能的！我能做到的”所以…

translation.en: you know, I dig in the back of my drawer for the old Speedo. I'm like, hm.
translation.zh: 我去抽屉后面挖出我的旧速比涛我就…

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 嗯 好吧

translation.en: So I get it, the goggles, my cap.
translation.zh: 我拿了泳衣、泳镜、泳帽

translation.en: So one morning, we head to the lake,
translation.zh: 然后一天早上 我们前往湖边

translation.en: and it is beautiful outside, and it's early.
translation.zh: 外面很美 天还很早

translation.en: The sun's coming up. Gorgeous rock, turquoise water.
translation.zh: 太阳正升起 华丽的岩石 碧蓝的湖水

translation.en: We dive in. The kids are upstairs sleeping.
translation.zh: 我们跃入水中 孩子们还在楼上睡觉

translation.en: My sisters are there. Their kids are upstairs sleeping.
translation.zh: 我的姐姐们也在他们的孩子也在楼上睡觉

translation.en: We start swimming, and I'm just like,
translation.zh: 我们开始游泳 而我在想：

translation.en: "Oh, my God. This is like if-- if you die and you're good your whole life,
translation.zh: “偶的天啊 如果你死了而你一生都安守本分

translation.en: this is where you go, right here. Lake Travis with your man.
translation.zh: 这就是你会去的地方 就这里特拉维斯湖 和你的男人

translation.en: Like, this is it."
translation.zh: 就是这里了”

translation.en: And we stop about halfway across 'cause, you know, open water swimming,
translation.zh: 我们游到中途时停下了 因为公开水域游泳

translation.en: you're looking for boats, you're looking for those things.
translation.zh: 你会注意看船只 注意看那种东西

translation.en: And all of a sudden, I catch Steve's eye. Now I'm gonna have to, like--
translation.zh: 然后突然之间我吸引到了史蒂夫的目光 现在我得… 我能借用你当我的人吗？

translation.en: Can I use you as my person?
translation.zh: 现在我得… 我能借用你当我的人吗？

translation.en: Yes? Great. Tell me your name.
translation.zh: 好吗？很好 告诉我你的名字

translation.en: -[man] Samuel. -Samuel.
translation.zh: -塞缪尔-塞缪尔

translation.en: So we're about-- Raise your hand, Samuel, for the people in the back. Okay.
translation.zh: 所以我们大概… 举一下手 塞缪尔让后面的人看一下 好

translation.en: So we're about this far apart, and I'm like...
translation.zh: 所以我们离彼此大概这么远 而我就…

translation.en: "I'm just gonna-- Steve?" And he goes, "Yeah?"
translation.zh: “好吧… 史蒂夫？”然后他说：“啥？”

translation.en: And I said, "I feel so connected to you.
translation.zh: 我说：“我觉得与你非常心连心

translation.en: I'm so glad that we're spending this time together doing this."
translation.zh: 我很高兴我们一起花这时间做这件事”

translation.en: And he looks back at me, and he goes, "Yeah, water's good,"
translation.zh: 他看回我 然后说： “是啊 水不错” 然后继续游泳

translation.en: and he keeps swimming.
translation.zh: “是啊 水不错” 然后继续游泳

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Oh, boy! So...
translation.zh: 噢 天 所以…

translation.en: my first thought, literally, is this.
translation.zh: 我的第一个想法是这个

translation.en: I'm embarrassed to share it with you, but I will.
translation.zh: 我很不好意思与你们分享 但我会的

translation.en: -"He is so overwhelmed with love for me." -[audience laughs]
translation.zh: “他对我的爱实在太汹涌澎湃…”

translation.en: That is my first thought, that he is not functioning.
translation.zh: 那是我的第一个想法 “导致他无法正常运作”

translation.en: Like, he is-- Like, I'm actually thinking to myself,
translation.zh: 他是… 我真的就自己在想：

translation.en: "I hope he's safe in this deep water with this feeling."
translation.zh: "我希望这如此强烈的感觉不会影响他在这深水中的安全”

translation.en: 'Cause it was like he couldn't process it, and--
translation.zh: 因为他好像不能消化似的

translation.en: And I have to be honest with you. He is a very courageous guy,
translation.zh: 而我得老实跟你们说他是个很勇敢的男人

translation.en: and he is much more likely to say that in our relationship
translation.zh: 在我们俩的关系当中他比我更有可能

translation.en: than I am to say that.
translation.zh: 说出那些话

translation.en: He's much more likely to go there and be that connecting,
translation.zh: 他更有可能去打开心扉去做这样的沟通

translation.en: and I'm not.
translation.zh: 而我不会

translation.en: I mean, I'm nice, but I'm not, you know, I'm not like that.

translation.en: They're like,
translation.zh: 他们说：

translation.en: "We have a huge creativity and innovation problem."
translation.zh: “我们有巨大的创造力和创新问题”

translation.en: I'm like, "But you don't want to talk about vulnerability?"
translation.zh: 我说：”可是你不要谈脆弱感？“

translation.en: No vulnerability, no creativity.
translation.zh: 没有脆弱感 没有创造力

translation.en: No tolerance for failure, no innovation.
translation.zh: 没有对失败的忍受力 没有创新

translation.en: It is that simple.
translation.zh: 就是这么简单

translation.en: If you're not willing to fail, you can't innovate.
translation.zh: 你如果不愿意失败 你将无法创新

translation.en: If you're not willing to build a vulnerable culture,
translation.zh: 你如果不愿意建立一个脆弱的文化

translation.en: you can't create.
translation.zh: 你将无法创造

translation.en: It's just that simple.
translation.zh: 就是这么简单

translation.en: Inclusivity, equity, diversity.
translation.zh: 包容性、公平性、多样性

translation.en: We're in the middle of really important movements right now,
translation.zh: 我们现在正处于非常重要的运动之中

translation.en: movements that I hope will change the world.
translation.zh: 我希望会改变世界的运动

translation.en: Black Lives Matter, Me Too, Time's Up.
translation.zh: “黑人命也是命”、“我也是”“是时候停止了”

translation.en: -These are-- These are big... -[audience applauds]
translation.zh: 这些极为重大…

translation.en: These are big movements.
translation.zh: 这些是极为重大的运动

translation.en: Trans Lives Matter. These are movements that matter,
translation.zh: “跨性别者的命也是命”这些是重要的运动

translation.en: and these are movements that have the potential to change things.
translation.zh: 而且这些是有潜力改变一切的运动

translation.en: What happens is, every organization I go into right now, they say,
translation.zh: 但事情是 我现在所踏入的每一个组织 他们都说：

translation.en: "We don't know how to have these conversations.
translation.zh: “我们不知道如何进行这样的对话

translation.en: They're incredibly uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 它们让人极度不舒服

translation.en: We're afraid we're gonna say the wrong thing.
translation.zh: 我们害怕会说错话

translation.en: We're afraid that what I say won't match my heart.
translation.zh: 我们害怕所说的和心里想的不一样

translation.en: I'll be taken the wrong way.
translation.zh: 我的意思会被误会

translation.en: People will make assumptions."
translation.zh: 别人会做假设”

translation.en: And so, I think there's a very clear answer here, which is,
translation.zh: 所以我认为这里有个非常明确的答案而那就是

translation.en: first, to not have the conversations because they make you uncomfortable
translation.zh: 第一 因为这些对话让你觉得不舒服而不去进行

translation.en: is the definition of privilege.
translation.zh: 这是特殊待遇的定义

translation.en: Your comfort is not at the center of this discussion.
translation.zh: 你的舒适不是这谈论的中心

translation.en: Like, that is not how this works.
translation.zh: 这不是那样运作的

translation.en: It just doesn't work that way.
translation.zh: 那是行不通的

translation.en: Of course you're going to get your ass handed to you in these conversations.
translation.zh: 在这些对话中你当然会被击得狼狈不堪

translation.en: And the whiter, straighter, Christian,
translation.zh: 而你的白、直、基督教多数民族文化的理念越强

translation.en: majority culture you are, the more mistakes you're gonna make.
translation.zh: 你犯的错就会越多

translation.en: It's not a question about whether you have a bias or not,
translation.zh: 这不是你是否有偏见的问题

translation.en: it's what biases do you have, and how many, and how bad, and how deep?
translation.zh: 而是你有什么偏见有多少、多糟、多深

translation.en: That's going to happen.
translation.zh: 那将会发生

translation.en: That's what we sign up for when we have these conversations.
translation.zh: 我们进行这些对话就是为了这个

translation.en: That's how it works. And then you listen,
translation.zh: 是这样运作的 然后你聆听…

translation.en: and you learn,
translation.zh: 你学习

translation.en: and you don't hold the people accountable.
translation.zh: 并不让这些人负起责任

translation.en: You know, the people who are targeted
translation.zh: 那些是种族主义、同性恋恐惧症

translation.en: by racism and homophobia, and heterosexism, and gender bias
translation.zh: 异性恋主义和性别偏见的攻击对象的人

translation.en: are not responsible... for initiating these conversations
translation.zh: 并没有责任去主动发起这些对话

translation.en: and building the tables where they should be happening.
translation.zh: 以及为这些对话提供可能

translation.en: -[audience applauds] -That's not-- That's not how this works.
translation.zh: 不是那样运作的

translation.en: We have to be able to choose courage over comfort,
translation.zh: 我们必须能够选择勇气而不是舒适

translation.en: and we have to say, "Look...
translation.zh: 我们必须说：“听着…

translation.en: I don't know that I'm gonna nail this, but I'm gonna try
translation.zh: 我不确定我能做得好 但我会尝试

translation.en: 'cause what I'm sure as hell not gonna do is stay quiet."
translation.zh: 因为我绝对不会他妈做的事就是保持沉默”

translation.en: That's what we can't do.
translation.zh: 那是我们不能做的事

translation.en: And so, yeah, you're gonna make a lot of mistakes.
translation.zh: 所以 是 你会犯很多错误

translation.en: Yeah, it's gonna be uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 是 你会很不舒服

translation.en: Yeah, you're gonna learn about blind spots
translation.zh: 是 你会发现你根本没想过

translation.en: that you didn't even know you had.
translation.zh: 自己会有的盲点

translation.en: And then you're gonna be grateful for that moment
translation.zh: 而你会很感激那一刻

translation.en: and take learning it...
translation.zh: 并将学习的主动权掌握自己手中

translation.en: into your own hands, not make other people responsible for teaching it,
translation.zh: 并将学习的主动权掌握自己手中 而不是把教导的责任丢给别人

translation.en: and that's how we move forward.
translation.zh: 那就是我们前进的方式

translation.en: But if you think there's gonna be real conversation in this country
translation.zh: 但你若想要在这个国家里

translation.en: or in companies or organizations
translation.zh: 或公司里、组织里进行一个

translation.en: around equity and-- and diversity and inclusivity...
translation.zh: 围绕着公平性、多样性和包容性的真正的对话

translation.en: while you remain comfortable,
translation.zh: 与此同时依然觉得舒服

translation.en: that is not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 那是不可能发生的

translation.en: And it shouldn't happen.
translation.zh: 而且也不应该发生

translation.en: So when we build cultures at work,
translation.zh: 所以当我们建立在工作中的文化

translation.en: where there is zero tolerance for vulnerability,
translation.zh: 是对脆弱感有零忍受力的

translation.en: where perfectionism and armor are rewarded and necessary,
translation.zh: 而完美主义和盔甲是被赞赏的和有必要的

translation.en: you can't have these conversations. They're not productive.
translation.zh: 你没办法有这些对话它们没成效

translation.en: How many of you think, tomorrow, if I had a magic wand
translation.zh: 你们多少人觉得 如果我有支魔法棒

translation.en: and I could wave it at where you work-- it's your office--
translation.zh: 而我能在你工作的地方 你的办公室挥一挥它

translation.en: and tomorrow morning when you walked in,
translation.zh: 然后明早当你踏进办公室时

translation.en: everyone in that office had the capacity for difficult, productive conversation,
translation.zh: 每个人都会有能力进行艰难及富有成效的对话

translation.en: how many of you think things would change overnight?
translation.zh: 你们多少人觉得那会一夜之间改变一切？

translation.en: If everyone could have really hard conversations?
translation.zh: 如果每个人都有能力进行极艰难的对话？

translation.en: We can't have them. You know what we end up doing?
translation.zh: 我们做不到你知道我们最终做啥吗？

translation.en: We end up talking about people instead of talking to people.
translation.zh: 我们不是和别人聊天 而是在聊别人

translation.en: And it's really--
translation.zh: 而那非常有害

translation.en: It's toxic. It just takes over culture.
translation.zh: 而那非常有害 那吞噬了文化

translation.en: Giving feedback, receiving feedback, problem-solving, ethical decision-making...
translation.zh: 提供意见、接受意见解决问题、做出道德决策

translation.en: These are all born of vulnerability.
translation.zh: 这些全孕育自脆弱感

translation.en: I understand that work seems like a hard place to be vulnerable,
translation.zh: 我明白工作似乎是一个很难让自己变得脆弱的地方

translation.en: but we spend more than half of our lives at work,
translation.zh: 但我们大半辈子就花在工作上

translation.en: and I've never met a single person or interviewed a single person
translation.zh: 而在这20年里 我不曾遇过或访问过

translation.en: in 20 years
translation.zh: 任何一个

translation.en: that had a joyful, wholehearted life that was miserable at work.
translation.zh: 有个喜悦和全心全意的人生但却在工作过得很难受的人

translation.en: That stuff will eat you alive.
translation.zh: 那东西会将你生吞活剥

translation.en: And we all have a responsibility to show up
translation.zh: 我们所有人都有责任站出来

translation.en: and bring our whole hearts and our whole selves to work
translation.zh: 全身心投入工作

translation.en: and lean in to the tough conversations.
translation.zh: 投入艰难的对话

translation.en: Brave leaders are never silent around hard things.
translation.zh: 勇敢的领导者永远不会在艰难的事情面前保持沉默

translation.en: Our job is to excavate the unsaid.
translation.zh: 我们的工作是出土未说出口的话

translation.en: What is the thing that's not being said?
translation.zh: 那些没被说出口的东西是什么

translation.en: And that requires courage and vulnerability.
translation.zh: 而那需要勇气和脆弱感

translation.en: People ask, "Where do I start with vulnerability?"
translation.zh: 人们问：“我该从哪里开始谈脆弱感？”

translation.en: And the best place to start is dispelling the myths.
translation.zh: 而最好开始的地方是消除错误的观念

translation.en: So myth one: Vulnerability is weakness.
translation.zh: 错误观念一：脆弱感是弱点

translation.en: I've spent a lot of time
translation.zh: 我花很多时间

translation.en: evangelizing around this, and here's the thing.
translation.zh: 大肆称许这一点 而这是重点

translation.en: I've cut it down to one question.
translation.zh: 我把它缩减成了一个问题

translation.en: And here's the question:
translation.zh: 那个问题是：

translation.en: Vulnerability...
translation.zh: 根据研究数据 脆弱感的定义

translation.en: is-- the definition of it, from the data-- uncertainty, risk, emotional exposure.
translation.zh: 根据研究数据 脆弱感的定义 是不确定性、风险、情感暴露

translation.en: So vulnerability is the feeling that we get when we feel uncertain,
translation.zh: 所以脆弱感是当我们感到不确定

translation.en: at risk, or emotionally exposed.
translation.zh: 有风险或情感被暴露时有的感觉

translation.en: So I was doing work with special forces
translation.zh: 那么我在与特种部队合作

translation.en: maybe a year ago now, and I asked a question.
translation.zh: 大概是一年前了 我问了个问题

translation.en: Could anyone, any one of the troops in this audience,
translation.zh: “有谁 部队里的任何一位

translation.en: give me an example of courage from their life
translation.zh: 能给我一个他们生命中的

translation.en: or something they witnessed in a colleague's life.
translation.zh: 或是在同事生命中目睹的勇气的例子

translation.en: A single example of courage
translation.zh: 就一个不需要不确定性

translation.en: that did not require uncertainty, risk, and emotional exposure,
translation.zh: 风险和情感暴露的勇气的例子”

translation.en: and there was just silence.
translation.zh: 而现场一片肃静

translation.en: And I waited, and it seemed like a long time, and finally...
translation.zh: 我等着 似乎很长一段时间然后终于…

translation.en: a young man stood up and said, "Three tours, ma'am.
translation.zh: 一个年轻伙子站起来说：“三个服役期 女士

translation.en: There is no courage without vulnerability."
translation.zh: 没有脆弱感 你无法成为勇敢”

translation.en: And so I would ask y'all, in here, give me a single example of courage
translation.zh: 所以我会问在场的你们给我一个你们生命中的

translation.en: in your life or that you've witnessed in someone else's.
translation.zh: 或是在别人生命中目睹的勇气的例子

translation.en: A single example of courage
translation.zh: 一个不需要不确定性

translation.en: that did not require uncertainty, risk, or emotional exposure.
translation.zh: 风险和情感暴露的勇气的例子

translation.en: I don't think you can.
translation.zh: 我不认为你能

translation.en: There is no courage without vulnerability.
translation.zh: 没有脆弱感 你无法成为勇敢

translation.en: Yet, how many were raised to believe that courage is an important value?
translation.zh: 然而 多少人从小被教导勇气是个重要的价值

translation.en: That you should be brave with your life? Show of hands.
translation.zh: 而你应该勇敢地活着？请举手

translation.en: How many of you were raised to believe that vulnerability is weakness?
translation.zh: 多少人从小被教导脆弱感是个弱点？

translation.en: Here's the rub. Be brave, but never put yourself out there.
translation.zh: 这就是问题所在：“要勇敢 但永远别踏出去”

translation.en: We've gotta dispel the myth, right?
translation.zh: 我们得消除错误观念 对吧？

translation.en: Number two: "I don't do vulnerability."
translation.zh: 第二 “我不信脆弱感那一套”

translation.en: Yes, you do.
translation.zh: 不 你信

translation.en: Anyone here manage to live to this point in your life
translation.zh: 这里有谁成功在没有不确定性

translation.en: without uncertainty, risk, or emotional exposure?
translation.zh: 风险和情感暴露的情况下活到现在吗？

translation.en: No. We do vulnerability. And here's the thing.
translation.zh: 不 我们确实有脆弱感

translation.en: You only have two options. There's-- You only have two options.
translation.zh: 而且重点是 你只有两个选择

translation.en: You do vulnerability knowingly,
translation.zh: 你知道自己有脆弱感

translation.en: -or vulnerability does you. -[audience laughs]
translation.zh: 不然脆弱感会打败你

translation.en: Vulnerability shows up, and you-- and if you don't know, just go home...
translation.zh: 脆弱感会给你露脸而如果你不知道 你只要回家

translation.en: and say, "Hey, do you think I do vulnerability well?"
translation.zh: 对你爱的人说：“嘿 你觉得我脆弱感处理得好吗？”

translation.en: to someone you love, and then step back a couple steps...
translation.zh: 然后退后几步

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -...and take in the truth.
translation.zh: 并领会真相

translation.en: You do vulnerability, knowingly or unknowingly.
translation.zh: 你有脆弱感 无论你知不知情

translation.en: And here's the thing. Here's why we need it.
translation.zh: 而这是重点 这是我们为什么需要它

translation.en: Man, it is so much easier to cause pain than feel pain.
translation.zh: 造成痛苦比感受痛苦来得容易多了

translation.en: And people are taking their pain
translation.zh: 而人们在把他们的痛苦

translation.en: and they're working it out on other people.
translation.zh: 发泄在别人身上

translation.en: And when you don't acknowledge your vulnerability,
translation.zh: 而当你不承认你的脆弱感

translation.en: you work your shit out on other people.
translation.zh: 你把你的屎事发泄在别人身上

translation.en: Stop working your shit out on other people.
translation.zh: 停止把你的屎事发泄在别人身上

translation.en: Right? Stop.
translation.zh: 对吧？停

translation.en: It's okay if you've got crazy stuff going on. Join the club.
translation.zh: 如果你在经历着很多疯狂的事那没关系 彼此彼此

translation.en: Like we all do.
translation.zh: 我们大家都有

translation.en: The difference is, don't offload your hard stuff on other people.
translation.zh: 差别是 别把自己艰难的事卸在别人身上

translation.en: Three: "I can go it alone." This was my favorite.
translation.zh: 第三：“我能自己来” 这是我的最爱

translation.en: One time after a talk, a guy came up to me and goes,
translation.zh: 一次演讲结束后一个男的走向我说：

translation.en: "I'm gonna try it.
translation.zh: “我会尝试

translation.en: I'm gonna try vulnerability...
translation.zh: 我会尝试脆弱感

translation.en: ...but I'm gonna try it by myself.
translation.zh: 但我会自己尝试

translation.en: And I'm gonna see how it goes,
translation.zh: 然后看看进展如何

translation.en: and then I'm gonna try it with other people."
translation.zh: 再跟别人一起尝试”

translation.en: And I was like,
translation.zh: 而我就…

translation.en: "I-- I don't think that's gonna work. Like, I don't know what that means."
translation.zh: “我不认为那会行得通 我不知道那是什么意思”

translation.en: And he's like,
translation.zh: 然后他说：

translation.en: "I'm just gonna...
translation.zh: “我会先自己来一段时间”

translation.en: do it alone for a while." And I was like, "All right, you get back to me."
translation.zh: “我会先自己来一段时间” 我说：“好吧 你再让我知道”

translation.en: We can't go it alone. We're neurobiologically hardwired
translation.zh: 我们不能自己来 我们大脑的天生设计是要我们与他人联系

translation.en: for connection with other people.
translation.zh: 我们大脑的天生设计是要我们与他人联系

translation.en: In the absence of connection, love, and belonging,
translation.zh: 没有联系、爱和归属

translation.en: there is always suffering.
translation.zh: 就总会有痛苦

translation.en: You can't go it alone.
translation.zh: 你不能自己来

translation.en: If you could, I would have found a way by now.
translation.zh: 如果你能的话那我早已找到个方法了

translation.en: As an introvert...
translation.zh: 作为一个内向者

translation.en: and somebody who loves humanity but is más o menos on people...
translation.zh: 和一个热爱人类 但对人就还好的人

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -...I would have found a way.
translation.zh: 我会早已找到个方法

translation.en: Number four: "You can engineer the uncertainty and discomfort
translation.zh: 第四：“你可以把不确定性和不适感

translation.en: out of vulnerability."
translation.zh: 从脆弱感中给设计掉”

translation.en: I work a lot with tech companies in Silicon Valley and around the world,
translation.zh: 我与硅谷和世界各地的科技公司 进行了很多合作

translation.en: and they really want to engineer
translation.zh: 而他们真的很想要

translation.en: the uncomfortable part out of vulnerability,
translation.zh: 把不舒服的那一部分从脆弱感中给设计掉

translation.en: to the point where one of them said,
translation.zh: 他们其中一人甚至说了：

translation.en: "We're thinking about an algorithm...
translation.zh: “我们在想着一个算法

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -...that could actually help you predict
translation.zh: 它可以帮你预测你什么时候可以安全地

translation.en: when it's okay to be vulnerable with other people."
translation.zh: 它可以帮你预测你什么时候可以安全地 向别人展现你的脆弱”

translation.en: And I was like, "The minute it becomes comfortable, it's no longer vulnerability.
translation.zh: “在它变舒服的那一刻它就不再是脆弱感

translation.en: Call it whatever you want, but don't use that name on your app."
translation.zh: 爱怎么叫随你但别给你的app用那个名”

translation.en: "Trust comes before vulnerability."
translation.zh: “信任先于脆弱感”

translation.en: This is a hard one, right?
translation.zh: 这个很难吧？

translation.en: Like, do I trust you then I'm vulnerable with you?
translation.zh: 我是信任你了才向你展现脆弱？

translation.en: Or am I vulnerable with you, and then I learn to trust you?
translation.zh: 还是先向你展现脆弱再学习信任你？

translation.en: And the answer is "yes and..."
translation.zh: 答案是 “接纳与添加”

translation.en: It's a slow stacking over time of vulnerability and trust.
translation.zh: 是信任和脆弱感随着时间的推移慢慢地堆叠

translation.en: We don't go out with, like, you know, the big guns, and like,
translation.zh: 我们不是马上就把大炮拿出来

translation.en: "Nice to meet you. I'm Brené. Here's my darkest secret.
translation.zh: 然后说：“你好 我是布琳这是我最黑暗的秘密

translation.en: Can I trust you forever?"
translation.zh: 我能永远信任你吗？”

translation.en: We start with little things, and we build over time,
translation.zh: 我们从小样的开始长期下来慢慢建立

translation.en: and the more I share with you, and the more you honor that sharing.
translation.zh: 而我与你分享的越多你就越尊重这种分享

translation.en: But here's the thing...
translation.zh: 但重点是这个

translation.en: you share with people who've earned the right to hear your story.
translation.zh: 你与那些博得资格听你故事的人分享

translation.en: Your story is a privilege to hear.
translation.zh: 听你的故事是个荣幸

translation.en: You share it with people who've earned the right to hear it.
translation.zh: 你与博得资格听的人分享

translation.en: You don't share it... just because.
translation.zh: 你不只是为了分享而分享

translation.en: Vulnerability minus boundaries: not vulnerability.
translation.zh: 脆弱感减去界线：不是脆弱感

translation.en: Last: "Vulnerability is disclosure."
translation.zh: 最后一个：“脆弱感是揭露”

translation.en: This goes back to the boundary thing.
translation.zh: 这就回到刚才的界线

translation.en: Live Tweeting your bikini wax: not vulnerability.
translation.zh: 实时发推你的比基尼脱毛？不是脆弱感

translation.en: Sharing the intimate details of your divorce and your pain on Facebook
translation.zh: 在脸书上分享你的离婚和痛苦的私密细节

translation.en: for your kids to read, who are reeling as well:
translation.zh: 给你也正感到震惊的孩子们读

translation.en: not vulnerability.
translation.zh: 不是脆弱感

translation.en: Again, vulnerability minus boundaries is not vulnerability,
translation.zh: 再次强调 脆弱感减去界线就不是脆弱感

translation.en: and you don't measure vulnerability by the amount of disclosure.
translation.zh: 而且你不用揭露的多少来衡量脆弱感

translation.en: You measure it by the amount of courage to show up and be seen
translation.zh: 而是用当你无法控制结果的时候

translation.en: when you can't control the outcome. Does that make sense?
translation.zh: 有多少勇气站出来被看见来衡量这样说有道理吗？

translation.en: Okay, we're gonna end with a story.
translation.zh: 好 我们用一个故事来总结

translation.en: So, Ellen, my daughter, decides to try swim team, and she tries--
translation.zh: 我的女儿艾伦决定尝试游泳队 她决定尝试一个全年游泳队

translation.en: She decides to try a year-round swim team,
translation.zh: 她决定尝试一个全年游泳队

translation.en: which is a big commitment 'cause we have a rule in our house
translation.zh: 而那是个很大的承诺因为我们家里有个规则

translation.en: that if you try a sport, you've gotta finish the season.
translation.zh: 如果你要尝试一项运动你必须完成那一个赛季

translation.en: So she-- I'm picking her up one day from swim team practice,
translation.zh: 有天我从游泳训练接她回家

translation.en: and she's-- she's young. She's probably...
translation.zh: 她那时很小 应该是五年级

translation.en: maybe fifth grade, and I can see-- How many of you have had this experience?
translation.zh: 她那时很小 应该是五年级 然后我能看见…你们多少人曾有这经历？

translation.en: I can see from her silhouette in front of me
translation.zh: 当我还排在八辆车后面时

translation.en: when I'm still eight cars behind that she's crying.
translation.zh: 我能从她的轮廓中看见她在哭泣

translation.en: Like, I can tell by the way she's holding her body that things are not okay.
translation.zh: 我能从她抱着自己身体的方式看出来事情不好了

translation.en: So I get up next to her. She gets in the car, and she's crying, and I said,
translation.zh: 所以我把车驾上去 她上车 她在哭泣 我说：

translation.en: "What's wrong? What happened? What's going on?" She goes,
translation.zh: “怎么了？发生了什么事？” 她说：

translation.en: "I have to swim the 100 breaststroke in the meet this weekend."
translation.zh: “这周末的比赛我得游90米蛙泳”

translation.en: And I'm thinking to myself, "No! Not the 100 breaststroke!"
translation.zh: 我自己在想：“噢 不！不要是90米蛙泳！”

translation.en: And I was like, "Man, that's a tough race."
translation.zh: 我说：“天啊 那不容易游”

translation.en: And she goes, "Mom, you know." And I was like,
translation.zh: 她说：“妈 你知道的” 然后我说：

translation.en: "That's a tough race, girl." And-- And here's the thing.
translation.zh: “那不容易游 女儿” 是这样的 蛙式是个很难的泳姿

translation.en: Breaststroke is a hard stroke.
translation.zh: 是这样的 蛙式是个很难的泳姿

translation.en: It's like, one day it just comes together, and you get it.
translation.zh: 它是那种会突然有一天手法和蛙脚会完美配合

translation.en: And like, the arms work with the frog legs, and it just happens.
translation.zh: 你就会开窍 然后就游得好

translation.en: But until then, while you're doing it, you actually don't propel forward.
translation.zh: 但在那之前 你在游的时候其实并没在向前推进

translation.en: Like, when you don't--
translation.zh: 当你没… 你会上前 然后退后

translation.en: You kinda go forward, then you come back, and then you go--
translation.zh: 当你没… 你会上前 然后退后 然后再上前

translation.en: And so, 100 yards is a long way for non-propelling.
translation.zh: 所以90米对无法前进来说是很长的距离

translation.en: I'm dying on the inside 'cause, you know, like,
translation.zh: 我的心揪成一块 因为你知道吗

translation.en: I wasn't a great swimmer either, and I had those moments,
translation.zh: 我也不是个很棒的游泳选手而我也经历过那些

translation.en: and, like, what I want to say is, "Well, run away and don't worry about it."
translation.zh: 我想告诉她的是：“逃跑吧 别担心”

translation.en: But I'm trying to be, like, the parent that--
translation.zh: 但我在试着成为那勇敢的父母

translation.en: you know, the brave parent. I'm like, "It's a tough thing.
translation.zh: 但我在试着成为那勇敢的父母 我说：“这事不容易

translation.en: Let's get home, get you showered. Let's talk about it.
translation.zh: 我们回家 你洗个澡 我们谈谈

translation.en: Let's talk about it with your dad."
translation.zh: 我们和你爸爸谈谈”

translation.en: And so we get home,
translation.zh: 所以我们回到家

translation.en: and she goes upstairs to take a shower, and she comes down, and...
translation.zh: 她上楼洗澡后下来

translation.en: Steve's home, and we sit down for dinner, and, you know, she starts crying again,
translation.zh: 史蒂夫回来了 我们坐下一起吃晚餐然后她又开始哭

translation.en: and she explains everything to her dad, and, you know, he's like,
translation.zh: 然后她向她爸爸解释一切 然后他说：“我们尊重你的教练

translation.en: "Well, I think we respect your coach, and it's your coach's call,
translation.zh: 然后他说：“我们尊重你的教练 那是你教练的决定

translation.en: and I think you're gonna have to swim if that's the race you're put in."
translation.zh: 而如果那是你被安排参加的我想你不得不游”

translation.en: And, you know, very much we aligned on messaging,
translation.zh: 所以咱们的观点是非常一致

translation.en: just like the books say.
translation.zh: 就像书本所说的

translation.en: And so she-- she starts crying. And she goes up after dinner and I'm like,
translation.zh: 所以她开始哭泣 晚餐后她上楼了我就：

translation.en: [grunts] "Curse you, Steve," and, you know, like, "You should have got her out of this!" Um...
translation.zh: “我诅咒你 史蒂夫你应该让她别参加！”

translation.en: Then she comes back down real quick, and she goes, "So you're sure?"
translation.zh: 然后她很快地又下来说：“你们确定吗？”

translation.en: -I'm like, "We're sure. This is--" -[audience laughs]
translation.zh: 我就：“我们确定 这是…”

translation.en: Yeah. So, but-- But I said, "Don't you think, Steve,
translation.zh: 对 但我说：“史蒂夫 你不觉得

translation.en: that she could take it up with her coach?
translation.zh: 她可以和她教练商量吗？

translation.en: If you don't want to swim it, take it up with your coach."
translation.zh: 如果你不想游 就去跟教练商量”

translation.en: She comes home the next day, and she said, "Coach Jason says I'm in.
translation.zh: 第二天她回家时说：“杰森教练说我得游

translation.en: A hundred yards-- 100 yards breaststroke. I'm doing it."
translation.zh: 90米蛙泳 我游定了”

translation.en: I said, "That's tough." Starts crying again,
translation.zh: 我说：“那不容易” 又开始哭了

translation.en: and she said, "My friend said
translation.zh: 然后她说：“我的朋友说

translation.en: that I could scratch my heat."
translation.zh: 我可以刷掉我的预赛”

translation.en: And so what that means is, in swim meets, they'll call an event,
translation.zh: 那意思是 在游泳比赛里他们会叫出项目

translation.en: like girls' 100 breaststroke,
translation.zh: 像“女子90米蛙泳”

translation.en: then they start calling heat. Heat one, heat two, heat three.
translation.zh: 然后开始叫预赛“预赛一、预赛二、预赛三”

translation.en: And swim meets run like this,
translation.zh: 游泳比赛是这样进行的

translation.en: and a lot of the time, swimmers miss their call.
translation.zh: 而很多时候叫预赛时游泳选手会没出现

translation.en: And so, that's considered scratching the heat. So her friend said,
translation.zh: 而那就算是刷掉预赛所以她的朋友说：

translation.en: "Just don't show up when they call your heat."
translation.zh: “他们叫到你的预赛时你就别出现”

translation.en: Which I know all about because I scratched some heats in my day.
translation.zh: 而我对那非常熟悉因为我当年刷了些预赛

translation.en: Only one or two, but for big races.
translation.zh: 就一两个 但是大型比赛的

translation.en: And I said, "You-- You could do that." And she goes, "I could?"
translation.zh: 然后我说：“你是可以那样做” 她说：“我可以吗？”

translation.en: And I said, "You definitely could do that. I think it's a choice.
translation.zh: 我说：“你当然可以我认为那是个选择

translation.en: You'll have to take that up with your coach
translation.zh: 但是你得跟你的教练商量

translation.en: if you don't show up on the blocks for, you know, for your race."
translation.zh: 如果你决定不出现在出发台上的话”

translation.en: And she said, "Will I get grounded here?"
translation.zh: 然后她说：“我会被罚不许出门吗？”

translation.en: And Steve's like,
translation.zh: 史蒂夫说：

translation.en: "No. No. I mean, that's your choice, Ellen, you know."
translation.zh: “不 艾伦 那是你的选择”

translation.en: And then she just starts sobbing. She said, "I'll never win this race."
translation.zh: 然后她就开始哭她说：“我不可能会赢这场比赛”

translation.en: And I said, "You will never win this race."
translation.zh: 我说：“你不可能会赢这场比赛”

translation.en: I said, "That is for sure," and I said, "But you know what?
translation.zh: 我说：“那是肯定的”接着我说：“但你知道吗？

translation.en: Sometimes winning is not coming in first.
translation.zh: 有时候赢不是获得第一

translation.en: Sometimes winning is doing the really brave thing.
translation.zh: 有时候赢是做了真正勇敢的事

translation.en: Maybe winning for you is just coming off the block and getting wet.
translation.zh: 也许赢对你来说就只是从出发台上跃下 让全身湿透

translation.en: Maybe that's winning for you.
translation.zh: 也许对你来说那就是赢

translation.en: Maybe that's what a win looks like."
translation.zh: 也许赢看起来就是这个样子”

translation.en: She goes,
translation.zh: 她说：

translation.en: "So if I scratch the heat, I don't get grounded?"
translation.zh: “所以如果我刷掉预赛我不会被罚不许出门？”

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -[Brené] And I said, "Yes. Right. Yeah."
translation.zh: 我说：“是 对 不会”

translation.en: So, it's meet day. We're there.
translation.zh: 比赛那一天 我们在那

translation.en: They call the heat. No-- We don't see Ellen.
translation.zh: 他们叫了预赛 我们没看见艾伦

translation.en: And then all of a sudden, at the last minute,
translation.zh: 然后突然之间 在最后一分钟

translation.en: she pops up on block number eight, you know,
translation.zh: 她出现在第八号出发台上

translation.en: so Steve and I situate ourselves at the end of the thing,
translation.zh: 史蒂夫和我移到出发台后面

translation.en: and then the gun goes off, and there they go.
translation.zh: 然后枪声一响 大家就跃入水中

translation.en: And I can see her, and she is struggling, and she's trying,
translation.zh: 我能看见她 她在挣扎、在努力

translation.en: and I can see, like, right kind of like at 75 yards,
translation.zh: 然后我能看见在70米的时候

translation.en: she checks the lanes, you know, 'cause she's in a far lane.
translation.zh: 她扫一眼其它泳道因为她在最尾的一条泳道

translation.en: She checks the lanes,
translation.zh: 她扫一眼其它泳道

translation.en: and she gets this look on her face like, "I'm ahead."
translation.zh: 然后她脸上露出这个样子：“我领先了”

translation.en: And-- And you can see, you know, like,
translation.zh: 你看得见 她就一副

translation.en: "Oh, my God. I'm ahead!"
translation.zh: “我的天啊 我领先了！”

translation.en: And then you can see, as she's finishing the final 25,
translation.zh: 然后你能看见在她完成最后的20米时

translation.en: that she understands that there are no other swimmers in the pool,
translation.zh: 她明白了泳池里已没有其他选手

translation.en: that she's been lapped so badly
translation.zh: 她是被超越了如此之多

translation.en: that the whole field is out of the pool,
translation.zh: 全部选手都早已离开泳池

translation.en: and that, in fact, when she finishes,
translation.zh: 而且 实际上 当她游完的时候

translation.en: not only are all the other girls from her heat out of the pool,
translation.zh: 不仅是所有跟她同一个预赛的女孩都已离开泳池

translation.en: the next heat is on the blocks, ready to go in,
translation.zh: 连下一场预赛的选手都已站上出发台准备跃入水中

translation.en: and people are just kinda watching but not watching.
translation.zh: 而人们也就看一半不看一半的

translation.en: And I can see her struggling to get out of the pool
translation.zh: 然后我能看见她挣扎着从泳池上来

translation.en: 'cause that's-- that was a big race.
translation.zh: 因为那是个大型的比赛

translation.en: When you're not going anywhere for that long, it's a lot of work.
translation.zh: 当你花那么长时间原地游泳那是很累人的

translation.en: I mean, it-- it's hard.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 那很艰难

translation.en: And I can see her, and she stops by her coach.
translation.zh: 然后我看见她停在她教练旁边

translation.en: He kind of bends down on one knee, and you can see her talking to him,
translation.zh: 他单膝跪下 你能看见她在和他说话

translation.en: and he's doing this, and she's just shaking her head.
translation.zh: 他在这样做 而她就只是在点头

translation.en: And she didn't have her goggles off,
translation.zh: 她没把泳镜摘下

translation.en: and I know she didn't have her goggles off 'cause I know she's crying.
translation.zh: 我知道那是因为她在哭

translation.en: And then she comes over and--
translation.zh: 然后她走过来…

translation.en: You know, and her dad-- And, you know, me and Steve, we were like mama and papa Phelps during this thing.
translation.zh: 我和史蒂夫 这比赛中我们就像妈妈和爸爸菲尔普斯

translation.en: It was like she was going for the Olympic trial.
translation.zh: 就像她参加着奥运会选拔赛似的

translation.en: We were like, "Pull! Pull!" Like, you know?
translation.zh: “拉水！拉水！” 你知道吗？

translation.en: There's no one in the water but Ellen, and people are just like,
translation.zh: 水中除了艾伦已没有其他人而人们就像：

translation.en: "Wrap it up. Pull, whatever, just, like--"
translation.zh: “拉水啦 随便啦 收工就对了”

translation.en: And she comes over, and she pulls her goggles off,
translation.zh: 然后她走过来 把泳镜摘下

translation.en: and she's just like--
translation.zh: 然后她就只是…

translation.en: Just, I think, ashamed and tired and exhausted.
translation.zh: 羞愧、疲惫、精疲力尽

translation.en: And she said, "Can I say a cuss word?"
translation.zh: 然后她说：“我能说句脏话吗？”

translation.en: And I was like, "Oh, hell, yes, you can say a cuss word."
translation.zh: 而我说：“开玩笑你当然能说句脏话”

translation.en: And she goes, "That sucked."
translation.zh: 她说：“那逊毙了”

translation.en: [Brené] And I said,
translation.zh: 而我说：

translation.en: -"That really did suck." -[audience laughs]
translation.zh: “那的确逊毙了”

translation.en: I said, "That sucked."
translation.zh: 我说：“那逊毙了”

translation.en: And then she stopped for a minute, and she was looking down, and she goes,
translation.zh: 然后她停了一会儿她往下看 然后说：

translation.en: "But I was brave, and I won."
translation.zh: “但我很勇敢 所以我赢了”

translation.en: -[audience] Ah! [applauds] -You know?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 而…

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: And, to me, she was brave, and she won.
translation.zh: 而对我而言 她很勇敢 所以她赢了

translation.en: Here's the thing. I'm not gonna bullshit you.
translation.zh: 是这样的 我不会跟你胡扯

translation.en: Vulnerability is hard, and it's scary, and it feels dangerous,
translation.zh: 脆弱感很难、很可怕、感觉很危险

translation.en: but it's not as hard, scary, or dangerous
translation.zh: 但更难、更可怕、更危险的是

translation.en: as getting to the end of our lives and having to ask ourselves,
translation.zh: 走到了生命的尽头而需扪心自问：

translation.en: "What if I would have shown up?
translation.zh: “如果我站出来了呢？

translation.en: What if I would have said I love you? What if I would have come off the blocks?"
translation.zh: 如果我说我爱你了呢？如果我从出发台跃下了呢？”

translation.en: Show up,
translation.zh: 站出来

translation.en: be seen, answer the call to courage,
translation.zh: 被看见 唤起勇气

translation.en: and come off the blocks 'cause you're worth it.
translation.zh: 从出发台一跃而下 因为你值得

translation.en: You're worth being brave. Thank y'all.
translation.zh: 你值得勇敢 谢谢大家

translation.en: [Brené] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Thank you! Thank y'all!
translation.zh: 谢谢！ 谢谢大家！

translation.en: Good night!
translation.zh: 晚安！
